mapper.select: SELECT seller_id, business_account_id, seller_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active FROM MASTER_SELLER ORDER BY seller_id
SELECT seller_id, business_account_id, seller_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active FROM MASTER_SELLER WHERE business_account_id = #{businessAccountId} ORDER BY seller_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_SELLER (business_account_id, seller_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active) VALUES (#{businessAccountId}, #{sellerName}, #{contactInfo}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{isActive})
